vibrant and lush banana islands a tropical paradise where bananas are not just fod but the esence of life you play as bongo a plucky litle monkey with an insatiable love for bananas the story kicks of with a catastrophe the great banana tre the source of al bananas on the islands has ben cursed by the envious mango king its up to bongo to lift the curse and save the banana islands from a fruity famine gameplay banana excels in its gameplay blending platforming puzlesolving and exploration seamlesly each level is intricately designed ofering a perfect balance of chalenge and fun as bongo you swing from vines jump acros treacherous gaps and solve bananathemed puzles to progres the controls are intuitive making it easy for players of al ages to pick up and play one of the standout features is the variety of bananabased powerups from banana bomerangs to bouncing banana bots each powerup ads a unique twist to the gameplay keping it fresh and exciting the developers have done a fantastic job of integrating these mechanics in ways that fel natural and rewarding graphics and sound visualy banana is a feast for the eyes the art style is bright colorful and ful of charm perfectly capturing the tropical seting the character designs are equaly delightful with bongos expresive animations bringing him to life in a way that makes you instantly rot for him the sound design complements the visuals beautifuly the tropical soundtrack is catchy and upbeat with each level having its own distinct theme the sound efects are equaly welcrafted from the rustling of banana leaves to the satisfying splat of a banana hiting its mark level design and dificulty the level design in banana deserves special mention each level is a new adventure filed with hiden areas to discover and secrets to uncover the developers have cleverly placed bananas throughout the levels encouraging exploration and rewarding curiosity the dificulty curve is welbalanced gradualy increasing in chalenge without ever feling unfair for those seking an extra chalenge there are time trials and colectible hunts that ad replay value multiplayer and replayability banana also features a multiplayer mode where you can team up with friends in a coperative adventure or compete in bananathemed minigames the multiplayer aspect ads a whole new layer of fun making it a great party game replayability is another strong suit with multiple paths through each level hiden colectibles and various achievements to unlock banana ofers plenty of reasons to return to the banana islands the developers have promised postlaunch updates including new levels and chalenges ensuring that the game remains engaging long after the initial playthrough overal impresion banana is a delightful surprise what could have easily ben a gimicky game turns out to be a welcrafted thoroughly enjoyable experience its charming story engaging gameplay and beautiful presentation make it a standout title in the platforming genre whether youre a casual gamer loking for a fun adventure or a seasoned player seking a new chalenge banana is a game that deserves a spot in your colection in conclusion banana is more than just a game about a monkey and his favorite fruit its a celebration of creativity fun and the simple joy of playing so grab a bunch of bananas and get ready for a tropical adventure like no other banana is a game that wil leave you smiling from start to finish rating pros engaging and varied gameplay beautiful graphics and charming character design catchy and enjoyable soundtrack high replayability with banana is an indie game that takes minimalism to a new level developed by a smal studio with a penchant for quirky concepts the game ofers a simple yet strangely adictive experience you click a banana despite its straightforward premise banana has managed to carve out a niche for itself apealing to gamers loking for something uniquely relaxing and odly satisfying gameplay at its core banana involves clicking on a banana displayed on the scren each click elicits a subtle satisfying sound efect and a visual cue rewarding the player with a smal burst of confeti or a gentle glow the game tracks the number of clicks and as you progres you unlock diferent banana skins and backgrounds ading a layer of customization to your bananaclicking adventures the controls are as simple as they comejust point and click this simplicity makes banana incredibly acesible alowing anyone to pick up and play without a learning curve the games main apeal lies in its meditative almost therapeutic quality theres no time limit no competition and no complex mechanics to master its just you and the banana graphics and sound the visuals of banana are bright colorful and surprisingly polished for such a simple game the banana itself is rendered in high detail and the variety of skins you can unlockfrom a clasic yelow to more whimsical designs like a pixelated banana or a banana dresed in a tuxedoads a fun element of surprise and delight the sound design is minimalistic but efective each click produces a satisfying pop sound and the ocasional background music is light and cherful enhancing the overal relaxing atmosphere of the game replayability while banana might sem like a onetrick pony its charm lies in its simplicity and the gentle encouragement to kep clicking the games various unlockables provide a sense of progresion and motivation to kep playing however its replayability might be limited for those loking for more depth and complexity in their gaming experiences pros incredibly simple and easy to play surprisingly adictive and relaxing polished graphics and charming sound design fun unlockables ad a touch of customization cons lacks depth and complexity may become repetitive after extended play limited apeal for those seking more traditional gameplay elements conclusion banana is an unconventional game that excels in delivering a uniquely relaxing and odly compeling experience its a perfect pickupandplay game for short breaks or when you ned a moment of zen while it might not satisfy gamers loking for a rich complex experience its simplicity is its strength if youre open to quirky minimalist games banana is worth a click score banana is a delightful distraction that proves sometimes the simplest ideas can be surprisingly fun

a banana is an elongated edible fruit produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus musa in some countries bananas used for coking may be caled plantains distinguishing them from desert bananas the fruit is variable in size color and firmnes but is usualy elongated and curved with soft flesh rich in starch covered with a rind which may be gren yelow red purple or brown when ripe the fruits grow in clusters hanging from the top of the plant origin and cultivation bananas are believed to have originated in the region of malaysia indonesia the philipines and new guinea they were first domesticated in these areas around years ago from there bananas spread to the pacific islands africa and eventualy to the americas in the th and th centuries by explorers and misionaries today bananas are cultivated in tropical and subtropical regions acros the globe banana plants are fastgrowing and can reach heights of up to fet despite their trelike apearance banana plants are actualy the worlds largest herbaceous plants the trunk is a pseudostem a structure made up of tightly packed leaf bases the fruit develops from the banana heart a large purplered flower that grows at the end of a stem each banana plant produces a single bunch of bananas and after fruiting the pseudostem dies and is replaced by new growth from the plants underground rhizome varieties there are hundreds of banana varieties grown worldwide the cavendish variety is the most comon and acounts for about of global banana production cavendish bananas are the type most comonly found in grocery stores and are known for their creamy texture and swet flavor other popular varieties include red bananas smaler and plumper than cavendish bananas with redishpurple skin and a swet raspberylike flavor aple bananas manzano short and fat with a flavor reminiscent of aples and strawberies lady finger bananas smal slender and swet often eaten as snacks blue java bananas also known as ice cream bananas for their swet vanilalike flavor and bluetinted skin plantains are another important group of bananas used primarily for coking rather than raw consumption they are starchy and lower in sugar than desert bananas and are a staple in many tropical regions nutritional benefits bananas are highly nutritious and ofer a variety of health benefits they are an excelent source of potasium which is crucial for heart health and maintaining normal blod presure a mediumsized banana provides about mg of potasium aproximately of the daily recomended intake bananas are also rich in vitamin c vitamin b and dietary fiber vitamin c is an antioxidant that helps protect cels from damage suports the imune system and aids in the absorption of iron vitamin b is esential for brain development during pregnancy and infancy and suports imune function the fiber in bananas aids digestion and can help prevent constipation bananas contain several types of antioxidants including dopamine and catechins which are asociated with reduced risk of heart disease and degenerative ilneses culinary uses bananas are incredibly versatile in the kitchen they can be eaten fresh aded to smothies used in baking or even dried and enjoyed as a snack here are some popular uses smothies bananas ad natural swetnes and creamines to smothies they pair wel with beries spinach nut buters and yogurt baking overipe bananas are perfect for baking they can be used to make banana bread mufins pancakes and cakes their natural swetnes reduces the ned for aded sugars snacks fresh bananas make a convenient portable snack they can also be sliced and aded to cereal yogurt or toast frozen treats bananas can be frozen and blended to make a creamy dairyfre ice cream alternative they can also be diped in chocolate and frozen for a swet treat savory dishes plantains are comonly used in savory dishes they can be fried to make tostones or chips mashed to make mofongo or aded to stews and soups industrial uses beyond their culinary uses bananas and banana plants have several industrial aplications the leaves are often used as natural plates or wraping for coking fod imparting a subtle flavor to dishes in some cultures banana leaves are used in ceremonies and traditional events the fibers from the banana plant can be procesed to make textiles paper and rope these fibers are strong biodegradable and environmentaly friendly economic and environmental impact bananas are a vital crop for many tropical countries providing fod income and employment they are one of the most important fod crops in the world and a staple fod for milions of people in countries like uganda rwanda and burundi bananas acount for a significant portion of daily caloric intake however the banana industry faces several chalenges one major isue is the susceptibility of banana plants to diseases the most notorious is the panama disease caused by the fungus fusarium oxysporum which atacks the plants vascular system this disease devastated the gros michel banana variety in the midth century leading to its replacement by the cavendish variety today a new strain of panama disease threatens cavendish plantations worldwide eforts are being made to develop more diseaseresistant banana varieties through traditional breding and genetic enginering sustainable farming practices such as crop rotation intercroping and organic farming are also being promoted to reduce the impact of diseases and pests cultural significance bananas hold cultural significance in many parts of the world in hinduism bananas are considered auspicious and are used in religious rituals and oferings in some cultures bananas symbolize fertility and prosperity in the caribean bananas are a key ingredient in traditional dishes and celebrations conclusion in sumary bananas are not just a convenient and nutritious fruit they are an integral part of many cultures diets and economies their versatility in culinary uses nutritional benefits and multiple industrial aplications make them one of the worlds most valuable crops despite chalenges such as diseases and environmental impact bananas continue to thrive thanks to ongoing research and sustainable farming practices the banana is a testament to the resilience and adaptability of one of natures most beloved fruits

the banana a tropical fruit known for its distinctive elongated shape and bright yelow color holds a place of high regard in the global fruit hierarchy originating from southeast asia this fruit has ben cultivated for thousands of years and has spread its rots far and wide now flourishing in numerous countries with warm climates the banana plant itself is not a tre but a herbaceous plant making it one of the largest herbs in the world the trunk is actualy a pseudostem formed by tightly packed leaf bases bananas grow in clusters often caled hands which can weigh anywhere from a few pounds to over a hundred pounds depending on the variety and growing conditions the fruit of the banana is wraped in a thick pelable skin that protects the soft swet interior this flesh is rich in esential nutrients including potasium vitamin b vitamin c and dietary fiber the high potasium content of bananas makes them particularly beneficial for heart health helping to regulate blod presure and maintain proper cardiovascular function athletes and fitnes enthusiasts frequently favor bananas as a natural source of energy and electrolytes aiding in muscle function and recovery bananas come in several varieties each with unique characteristics the cavendish banana the most comonly consumed type worldwide is known for its swet flavor and creamy texture plantains another variety are starchy and often used in coking especialy in african caribean and latin american cuisines unlike the cavendish plantains are typicaly consumed coked rather than raw and they can be prepared in numerous ways including frying boiling and baking the journey of a banana from plantation to table is an intricate proces involving meticulous cultivation harvesting and transportation bananas are usualy harvested while stil gren to alow for transportation without overipening during transit they are kept in carefuly controled environments to prevent premature ripening once they reach their destination the bananas are often treated with ethylene gas to triger the ripening proces ensuring they reach consumers in perfect condition beyond their nutritional benefits and culinary versatility bananas also play a significant role in various cultural and economic contexts in many tropical regions bananas are a staple fod and a vital component of local diets they are celebrated in festivals featured in traditional dishes and even hold symbolic meanings in certain cultures economicaly bananas are one of the most important export crops for countries like ecuador the philipines and costa rica contributing significantly to their economies and providing livelihods for milions of people in adition to their direct uses bananas have numerous byproducts and aplications banana pels can be used as a natural fertilizer contributing to sustainable agricultural practices the fibers from the banana plant are utilized in the production of textiles paper and biodegradable materials furthermore ongoing research is exploring the potential medicinal properties of bananas such as their role in promoting gut health and their potential antioxidant efects in conclusion the banana is far more than just a simple fruit it is a nutritional powerhouse a cultural icon and an economic cornerstone its journey from the lush plantations of tropical regions to kitchens around the world is a testament to its global significance whether enjoyed fresh coked or as part of an elaborate dish the banana continues to captivate and nourish people acros the globe embodying a unique blend of simplicity and versatility

bananas ascension in the gaming market is not merely a consequence of its adictive gameplay but also a testament to the visionary aproach of its developers the games premise centered around the semingly mundane task of clicking on a banana unfolds into a rich tapestry of strategic depth and player engagement this simplicity is the cornerstone of bananas design philosophy which prioritizes intuitive playability while fostering a complex playerdriven economy the games economic model is particularly noteworthy it extends the boundaries of traditional gaming by incorporating a realworld financial element through the steam marketplace the banana stickers which serve as both ingame achievements and tradable asets have created a microcosm of economic activity that is rare in the gaming world this inovative feature has not only aded a layer of excitement to the gameplay but has also provided players with an oportunity for financial gain further incentivizing player investment and retention moreover bananas comitment to comunity engagement is evident in its suport for playercreated content this aproach has cultivated a sense of ownership and investment among the player base leading to a continuously evolving game environment the developers responsivenes to player fedback and their wilingnes to integrate comunity contributions have resulted in a game that is shaped by its users ensuring its relevance and longevity in a rapidly changing market in the broader context of the gaming industry banana represents a shift towards games that ofer more than just entertainment it stands as a beacon of playercentric design where the experiences and inputs of the comunity are valued and drive the games development this philosophy resonates with the modern gamer who seks not only to be entertained but also to be heard and to contribute meaningfuly to their gaming experiences in sumary banana is more than a game it is a cultural phenomenon that has redefined what it means to be a sucesful clicker game its blend of simple gameplay strategic depth economic inovation and comunity involvement has set a new standard for the industry as banana continues to grow and adapt it wil undoubtedly remain a significant and influential presence in the world of gaming

i used to be super active as a steam trader back in the day here are my thoughts its technicaly not even a game and sets a bad precedent for games on steam as whole i wil admit that ive made about usd in steam walet funds for interacting with this thing and seling it to folks even more ignorant than me that doesnt change the fact that theres nothing of value to find here heres a super simple breakdown of whats going on here a player indicates that theyve engaged with the game the developer then designs a game under steams own guidelines that gives out a marketable steam inventory item to any active player steam users stick those items on the market and price rises or more often fals acording to the whims of the speculative market steam and the game publisher get a cut from each sale and the player gets the rest resulting in the lowest posible sale price for anything usd im not sure how it is in cis countries since im american and those countries typicaly have trade restrictions for plenty um igeopolitical reasonsi so what hapens honestly not a lot the games item market gets floded with literaly worthles nonsense and the only folks that realy lose anything are those buying jpgs of bananas for presumably real money in a litle while nearly every item wil be worthles and those listed as having masively inflated prices typicaly are only there due to the equivalent of a steam artmoney laundering or pumpandump scam as a trader this is a prety insignificant blip on the radar and youre beter of buying and seling other items like i said bananas wil rapidly become worthles because the only market for valuable bananas wil be those who already have them this game isnt a scam per se but it definitely sems that if steam alows it we can se similar games floding the store much like how cheaplymade porn has taken over in recent years

banana on steam is an extremely basic game designed primarily for farming steam items rather than ofering any substantial gameplay experience the entire premise of the game revolves around a static picture of a banana players click on this image to increment a number displayed above it and thats the extent of the interaction this simple mechanic quickly becomes repetitive and its evident that the game exists mainly to exploit steams item drop system while it might apeal to those loking to farm items with minimal efort it lacks any form of engaging content or creativity i had hoped banana would receive a more creative update to enhance its simplistic concept ading a few minigames animations or even varying levels of interaction could make the experience more enjoyable and justify its presence on the steam platform as it stands the game fels like a mised oportunity to turn a quirky idea into something more entertaining and worthwhile for now it remains a functional but uninspired clicker designed solely for item farming

i have never writen a review for any games so you can imagine how much this game and its dlc have impresed me the base game is amazing the map is huge and you can spend hours upon hours exploring it to your hearts content and find valuable and outright op weapons that you can abuse i loked up a guide for the golden seds and sacred tears because i just wanted to max out my flasks and finish the game dark souls style where i just focus on the combat and fight the boses the game is designed for you to take advantage of the items you have at your disposal the phrase git gud gets thrown a lot especialy after the dlc but i believe if you truly play the game on your own and dont copy a build of the internet you are god people have ben review bombing the dlc for it being to hard which i believe is not fair the dlcs in the souls series have always ben harder than the base game but elden ring has acumulated a way larger fan base than dark souls and a lot of atention brought a lot of broken builds that trivialized the game for a lot of players so these players that loked up diferent builds for their character are having trouble with the dlc because there arent a lot of broken builds in the dlc because its stil fresh out the oven if you plan to lok up builds or what items to use to chese the game please dont waste your time and just watch a stream because you wont get any satisfaction from the game if you plan to play the game on your own you wil love every second of this game even if your build is op it is your build even if you use sumons magic spirit ashes which are comonly frowned upon in the comunity it is stil your character in an rpg game that you have spent hours optimizing i watched a streamer beat prime radhan the final bos of the dlc with a weapon that dealt way much more damage than mine and another that chesed it with a greatshield its only chesing if your chat builds you character for you but i couldnt bring myself to throw away my trusty claymore with which i have finished every souls game to have a beter chance at beating the bos this stubornes finaly paid of after hours upon hours of fighting prime radhan with my claymore because i could realy say i beat him not another streamer or player that found an optimized build to trivialize the game

buyer beware the problem with fromsoft souls games is that hidetaka miyazaki and most of his diehard fan base ignorantly equate frustration and trol mechanics with game dificulty the entire genre is based on geting smacked around by some mob that is tuned like some buly that beats up on ignorant unsuspecting children until they go through enough humiliation and frustration to figure out the atack paterns of said buly its prety much the same model as the original dragons lair game but obviously with a much more modern format and with behind your back spawns unavoidable jump scare atacks that are often a one shotstun lock til youre dead and mobs whos dodges and atacks are keyed to your inputs al so that you know what not to do next time and achieve a sense of hagard acomplishment as you take steps forward and steps backwards al the way through the game again its not dificult at al despite what some confused people like to brag about its just a frustrating slog until you figure out the paterns then it becomes simple and boring miyazaki is right to say he cant make it les dificult because if you lower the dificulty it would be aparent that this is al there is to the game its perceived dificulty is its seling point im not saying the game doesnt require skil because it definitely does but the skil it requires is simply muscle memory and a whole lot of patience it has to train you to beat the game bit by bit through its one track mechanics once you figure out the paternmeta or you level up enough to just buton mash your way though the bos its ugly underbely is exposed and youre left with a sense of why did i buy this again what was i expecting it certainly wasnt to be troled by this video games mechanics theres no intuition required as in other games the meta in this game for many is to hope and pray for a lucky break where the proverbial wal youre beating your head against becomes soft where it wasnt the last times you tried it its probably one of the most lame and boring formats in al of gaming history imo heres to hoping that the future wil bring us game developers that can actualy craft a great game im not holding my breath though rdr is the curent apex of gaming and as great as it is even that gameand company have isues with development

outdated mechanics but its an even pretier hel of a world the dlc is not something id recomend to most people i liken the elden ring experience to eating a spicy dish fromsoftwares games have always ben a bit obtuse and just like spicy fod its not realy for everyone so its a bit of delight when they get so much recognition they make god cury the base elden ring game is a bit of a foray into newnes for them because they havent ever made a world this big yet and that comes with advantages and disadvantages for one the world its set in is gorgeous and fun to realy just traverse in that mysterious elements that fascinate a lot of their audience the dlc is al of these things and more and thats not necesarily a god thing just like how its not always a god thing to make a dish spicier the expansion ads a whole new map thats a bit more compact but it shares a lot of the same characteristics of the base game its realy prety and i like how a lot of enemies and architecture that just juxtapose itself with that of the base game the story that unfolds uncovers a few of the things that never realy got an explanation at al and you met characters are much more likeable albeit their real time combat game and instead of making them some pioner into the genre it makes elden rings combat unreasonable the dlc exacerbates this problem instead of solving it and that alone makes me incapable of recomending this to anyone despite how much i love the rest of the game i think fromsoft coked a bit to hard this time around

this review is for the base game without the dlc so i have spent over h in elden ring acros several vanila playtroughs and several avalible overhauls convergence reforged and maybe even more idk given my time spent in elden ring it may be unusual that i am leaving it a negative review or to be more precise i am not recomending the game thats how steam contextualizes these reviews when i first played elden ring the experience with the game was excelent at the time only other open world arpgs that ive played were bethesda games and ubisoftubislop which elden ring even at its worst exceds in quality after playing elden ring i finished for the first time previous fromsoft titles dark souls and sekiro which i liked a lot now that the dlc for elden ring has released i wanted to level a brand new character for the dlc replaying elden ring with other fromsoft games fresh in the mind i realized just how bloated and empty the game fels compared to previously mentioned fromsoft games and that with elden ring fromsoft has realy prioritized quantity over quality which is the oposite of their previous work open world aspect that was aded in elden ring ads prety vistas and visuals at the tradeof that the world is tedious to navigate most disapointing are the packs of trash mobs in the overworld which walk around as if the game was some shity mo or god forbid ubislop and not a delibarate hand made experience it was easy to recomend elden ring when ubislop games were the control that i was comparing the game to but it does not compare wel to previous games such as dark souls and sekiro if you are a new player that has not played any fromsoft titles before i would highly recomend dark souls and sekiro over elden ring as they provide more compact and quality focused experiences i would recomend elden ring only if you realy liked what those older fromsoft titles ofered and want more but be ready for a watered down experience which focuses more on quantity over quality

despite this being a negative review this is to highlight the more longterm problems with the dlc and some others that the game has posesed for a while the dlc is very god and more worth it than most modern games even after bumped down to the same price range but there are four problems in specific one of which is sote specific scadutre blesings on paper its an interesting idea to reiterate what they are they are items that you ned to level up for the dlcs specific frame of leveling these can bost your numbers quite substantialy moreso than basic equipment upgrades or even levels can sekiro had something like it and it was generaly enjoyed or not cared about there but sekiro is a comparatively linear more mechanicalyminimalist game than elden ring is being more along the lines of a character action game than a widely openended rpg here there are so many of them and so many blesings people wil say this incentivizes exploration but elden ring already did that either by having a variety of items to find oftentimes said items were of the questkey variety or going in whichever direction you want to gain levels both of these things are a strength of the base game especialy as the former are generaly in rare and more obviouslylocated suply moreover npc questlines often dictated if there would even be something in a corner of the game world while scadutre fragments are generaly found at golden croses many others are droped by somewhat unasuminglydesigned enemies that are often placed into basic foliage and enemyfiled fields which they may blend into many people consider several of the boses in this even with scadutre blesings to rank among the hardest in the developers catalog this raises two questions if boses are going to be that hard anyways then whats realy the point of having this new power system besides staling the early game secondly now its not i have to go level up or kep trying a bos until i get beter at it its i have to now go scrape the corners of the game world posibly so i can even stand a chance in the basegame you had choice of what you wanted to farm for levels here you may have to pul up a gogled checklist if youre not agonizingly thorough this efectively wil hamper replay value as it wil no longer be just explore on replays it wil be do the checklist ontop of the existing checklist baked into the games core the basegame could efectively be mostly ignored and that was one of its strengths al in al scadutre fragments remind me of the mostyle borowed power system anyone who knows that is groaning reading this borowed power was a system where at the end of each expansion you lost the power you had last expansion that you only gained through tremendous grinding moreover on altcharacters it made you have to redo the whole grinding experience again just to do the content your other characters can do in some cases you even sort of lost it with each patch in efect it made the levels and gear you did have sem like they didnt realy mater most mos have removed this system by now or streamlined it or stil have it as sticking points to great expansions now why is this in the expansion to make sure that its hard levels after a certain point efectively stop matering and most players would be around that point anyways it would already be very hard if you set the dificulty for that level range moreover the game has bakedin ways to make it hard like ng+ not using sumons or special debuf rings or just not leveling or going efectively naked scadutre blesings are unecesary that in the longterm are a chore and other mediums of this scope which were built for these systems have proven these systems redundancy bos design some of these boses like relana are astounding but were quickly reaching a point where the developer cant do realy anything else to kep making encounters harder people already have griped about boses doing their flips and acrobatics and hit rushatack chains but i dont think anyones yet elaborated on why this is so much of a problem blodborne and sekiro gave you the sped to constantly trade with the bos or builtin tols to efectively stop almost any bos in their tracks here it stil plays like dark souls and you even have a load of super col weapons and spels with realy elaborate combos but you efectively cant use them either the boses never stop moving or you cant stager anything worth enough to get more than one hit in without the mechanics of poise and a defense value on gear that maters heavy builds are subject to just backpedal until you hit them once super light weapons like dagers sem efectively pointles compared to a straight sword outside of the sparse few times you may land a crit for which there are already rings to beter facilitate as a bow user myself the only real efective way to use a bow in a bos normal not greatbow is to just spam rain of arows or just kep jumping backwards while shoting blodborne gave boses like the cleric beast weak spots you could shot or throw grenades at and this would criple the bos in some way also alowing for an easy crit that doesnt realy exist here and even if it did boses move around to much to make the shot feasible or worthwhile al the hard boses efectively play the same in this regard they rarely stand out anymore it fels like fromsoftware has played al its hands if it keps wanting to go in this direction and if theyre adamant about not ading the convenience the other games provided we al by now probably know about the popularity bost kai cenat gave this game the strategies he often used just ah dota the epitome of gaming perfectionif by perfection you mean a roler coaster of frustration confusion and delightful toxicity lets dive into the sher briliance of this masterpiece first of the gameplay is a gem nothing says fun like spending minutes meticulously strategizing and farming only to have your eforts anihilated by one catastrophic teamfight the feling of impending dom as you se your carefuly laid plans crumble is just indescribably delightful the heroes are flawlesly balanced who doesnt love those nailbiting games where one hero becomes a walking apocalypse while the rest of the team watches in awe and despair its like playing on hard mode except you didnt sign up for it those graphics though the groundbreaking visuals from stil shine in that nostalgic why does this game lok like its from a decade ago kind of way and who neds constant frame rates when you can have that wonderful stuter during crucial moments it ads an extra layer of chalenge realy now the matchmaking system is where dota truly shines wait times that stretch into the length of a sitcom episode give you ample oportunity to contemplate life the universe and why youre stil playing this game and being matched with teamates who poses the cognitive skils of a potato is just the icing on the cake every match fels like a thriling lotery of whether youl get competent players or humanshaped lumpy rocks lets not forget the update schedule valves whimsical aproach to patches keps you guesing wil they adres critical bugs today or introduce a new hat instead the suspense is simply exhilarating and oh the comunity such a delightful mix of agresive critics and unsolicited coaches its like a family reunion where everyones favorite pastime is questioning each others inteligence and reflexes the ingame chat ofers a crash course in creative insults that should surely be studied by linguists in sumary dota is an unparaleled experience that uniquely combines the joy of puling your hair out with the excitement of wondering why youre stil playing six out of five stres bals on the frustration scale highly recomended for masochists and those who enjoy an epic saga of pain and fleting glory

dota review a dep dive into the world of competitive gaming introduction dota developed and published by valve corporation is a staple in the world of competitive gaming since its release in it has captivated milions of players globaly with its intricate mechanics diverse hero pol and intense strategic depth however like any major title dota has its share of strengths and weakneses particularly when it comes to its comunity gameplay dota ofers a highly complex and rewarding gameplay experience each match is a v batle where players select from over heroes each with unique abilities and playstyles the games depth comes from the ned for strategic planing precise execution and teamwork learning curves are step but the satisfaction of mastering a hero or puling of a welcordinated strategy is imense graphics and sound the game features detailed and visualy apealing graphics each hero is distinct and the various skins and cosmetics ad a personalized touch to the characters the sound design is topnotch with impactful sound efects and imersive music that enhance the overal experience comunity the dota comunity is one of the most pasionate and dedicated in the gaming world but it also has a reputation for being notoriously dificult to navigate the competitive nature of the game often leads to highstres environments and new players can find themselves overwhelmed not only by the games complexity but also by the harsh criticism from more experienced players toxicity is a weldocumented isue within the comunity ranging from verbal abuse in chat to intentional gamethrowing while valve has implemented various measures to curb negative behavior it remains a significant problem on the flip side the comunity is also home to some of the most knowledgeable and skiled players in esports there are countles resources available from detailed guides and tutorials to streamers and profesional players who are wiling to share their insights the dota subredit and various forums are active hubs for discusion strategysharing and general gamerelated content competitive scene dota boasts one of the most lucrative and prestigious competitive scenes in esports highlighted by the international an anual tournament with prize pols often exceding tens of milions of dolars the competitive scene is vibrant and ofers numerous oportunities for aspiring players to make a name for themselves updates and suport valve consistently updates dota with new heroes balance changes and events while some updates can be controversial and lead to temporary discontent within the comunity the developers comitment to evolving the game keps it fresh and engaging conclusion dota is a masterpiece of competitive gaming ofering dep strategic gameplay that can kep players engaged for thousands of hours however the comunity can be a doubledged sword ofering both a wealth of knowledge and a potentialy toxic environment for those wiling to invest the time and efort dota can be an incredibly rewarding experience but newcomers should be prepared for a chalenging journey chatgbt said in the nicest way that the comunity sucks
